The correct answer is A: The Qt Reference documentation page for QPushButton opens in the help view.
When the instructor presses F1 during event 11, it opens the Qt Reference documentation page for QPushButton in the help view. This allows the students to see the detailed information and documentation for the QPushButton widget.

We refer to Wikipedia articles on software engineering for help. In event 14, the instructor maps the click of the PushButton to the close() function of the MainWindow using a connection dialog.

Therefore, the answer is (A).
